summary: Utility module that supplies helper functions and classes used during the sampling phase of Stable Diffusion models, including conversions between sigma representations, retrieval of ancestral step parameters, linear multistep coefficient handling, and a placeholder implementation for disabling dynamic thresholding.
business_intent: Support the generation pipeline of text-to-image models by providing lightweight, reusable components that simplify noise schedule calculations and thresholding logic during diffusion sampling.
